A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Not only was this an objectively bad movie with terrible pacing\, a nonsensical plot(even within the context of science fiction)\, and cringe-worthy dialogue\, it manages to completely subvert everything about the original trilogy.

Characters are sidelined\, given the ultimate power of Deus Ex Machina\, and outright misused. Every plot point and message from the original trilogy has been subverted and invalidated. 

If you are a fan of the original trilogy and you haven't seen this movie\, DON'T. Keep Star Wars alive in your mind. I have been a fan of Star Wars and Luke Skywalker in particular since I was 4 years old\, and I can never again see the original trilogy. I am utterly heartbroken.
